name: Click-A-Nut
description:
Have you ever wanted to Click-A-Nut?  Well now you can, Click-A-Nut to buy things to make more Nuts, what the point you ask, well I don't know, why do you play cookie clicker? download it if you want to Click-A-Nut.

(that was the end of the terrible description)

Controls:

Right Click on the buttons with pictures to open up info box

Space to close the info window

Left Click to Buy ( this includes the buildings and the boxes with pictures)

S to Save

If it gets over 1,000 downloads I will update it but I got other games to make
